targets.query: SELECT mean(percentage) FROM (SELECT ("received"/"transmitted")*100 AS percentage FROM "ping_rtt" WHERE "host" = 'www.amazon.com' AND "region"='aws-london') WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT mean(percentage) FROM (SELECT ("received"/"transmitted")*100 AS percentage FROM "ping_rtt" WHERE "host" = 'www.google.com' AND "region"='aws-london') WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
